attributes.action: customers to be given reasin for declined credit
attributes.additional_details:
ever been refused credit and couldnt get your head around why? to be told the same old thing that its not one reason but a few collective and you should view your credit file for answers?
well im fed up of this, my credit file costs me money and never gives an answer, i want to know from the creditor the reason for my refusal and at least then it might be something i can put right.
i want to make companies that offer finance give you detailed reasons do rejection and not hide behind premium credit checking services
